dict.acceptation: 院子；码（等于3英尺或36英寸或0。9144米）；场地；帆桁；

sent.orig: Yard villa is constituted by triple yard forms, inner yard, concave yard, and outside yard.
sent.trans: 院落别墅由内庭院、凹庭院、外庭院三重庭院形式组成。

sent.orig: They laid the yard with straw/laid straw over the yard.
sent.trans: 他们将稻草铺在院子里。

sent.orig: His yard was neatly cut, countless flowers remained in bloom, and the sidewalk was edged yard.
sent.trans: 他的院子及人行道的边沿都修剪整整结结，一点杂草都没有，只有珍奇斗艳绽放的花儿。

sent.orig: They regained their lost territory yard by yard.
sent.trans: 他们一码一码地收复了失地。

sent.orig: Many people on the streets with yard grass, yard equipment inside the firecrackers and fireworks.
sent.trans: 街道上许多沿街叫卖用草扎的小鹿，小鹿内中装了鞭炮和烟。
